text_block_list.text:
Today's our day off, so I decide to<n>visit a café Curren was
talking about<n>on Umastagram.

I'm hoping it will give me some new<n>insight into what kind
of person she is<n>behind the scenes. There's just one<n>
problem...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Mm! ♪ Yum, yum! ♪ Nothing makes<n>me happier than a
parfait! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Whew, I finished that thing quick.<n>What a shame.
It seems like Curren also pickedtoday to pay this cafe a visit. At least itdoesn't look like she's noticed meyet...
choice_data_list: (I'll just keep an eye on her for now...)

text_block_list.text:
I do feel a bit weird about this, but it's<n>also a perfect chance
for me to learn<n>something about her mysterious<n>private
life.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ooookay! ♪ Think it's about time I<n>went shopping.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wow, this dress is so cute! ♪ I looove<n>deep reds!

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text: I take it you're a fan of darker<n>colors? They suit you well.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks a bunch! ♪ I'm a fan of<n>how darker colors
really show off<n>your skin tones.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like I remember this one time, in an<n>elementary school
presentation, I went<n>for a magenta look for just that<n>
reason! And when I was four, I think I<n>wore violet?

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text: You—you utilized contrast in your outfitat the age of four?! That'sthe Curren for you!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I've made up my mind! I'll take this<n>dress.

After that, Curren continues shopping,<n>heading from one
shop to the next.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wow, so cuuute! A cat plushie! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"Curren Chan, take me with you!"<n>Hm, should I bring you
home? What to<n>do?

text_block_list.name: Random Passerby
text_block_list.text: Mm? Urk! Ngh?! S-s-so cute!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hm? Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Random Passerby
text_block_list.text:
A g-g-goddess? Or... an angel? No,<n>wait... have I just opened
my eyes<n>truly for the very first time?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you look enlightened. Welcome<n>to your new,
Currentastic world! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I'm on Umastagram, so I'd love it if<n>you followed me at
@Curren! ♪

text_block_list.name: Random Passerby
text_block_list.text: As... you wish! Cute... Cute Curren<n>Chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Thanks sooo much! ♪

...I get it now. She doesn't have any<n>notion of separating her
public and<n>private lives. No matter when or<n>where, she's
always living in the<n>cutest way she knows how.
choice_data_list: (...What am I even doing right now?)
(...What am I even doing right now?)

text_block_list.text:
Feeling embarrassed at myself for<n>trailing her in secret
when she has<n>nothing to hide, I make up my mind to<n>
apologize to her and—

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So? Big Bro, when are you going to<n>talk to me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So? Big Sis, when are you going to<n>talk to me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Sheesh, I've been waiting for you,<n>you know? You're such
a naughty<n>tease, Big Bro!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Sheesh, I've been waiting for you,<n>you know? You're such
a naughty<n>tease, Big Sis!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Want to get some fresh air?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Big Bro... you don't trust me, do you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Big Sis... you don't trust me, do you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Today, you spied on me... because<n>you wanted to know
more about me,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I'm glad you're curious and<n>all. It's just... I like to
choose what<n>side of me people see.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I pick out only the cutest moments to<n>show everyone. And if
that leaves the<n>"real" me a mystery, well... that's<n>just part
of my charm.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Make sense? I want you looking at<n>the parts of me you'll
love. I want you<n>to love "Curren Chan."

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Make sense? I want you looking at<n>the parts of me you'll
love. I want you<n>to love "Curren Chan."

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Okay? You can do that, right? Pretty<n>please?

...If I were in any other position, I<n>might be willing to do as
she asks. It<n>might even be the happiest option for<n>both of
us. But...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: It's not okay, because I'm your trainer.
It's not okay, because I'm your trainer.

text_block_list.text:
It's my job to make her dreams<n>come true. And to do that, I
need to<n>see beyond the charming image she<n>shows the
world.
choice_data_list: I want you to tell me more about yourself.
I want you to tell me more about yourself.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...You hate losing just as much as I<n>do.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: All right. I'll consider it an eensy bit. Imean, you did want to know sobadly that you started stalking meand all.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, then I suppose I'll... forgive<n>you! ♪ After all, you're
in love with<n>me, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, then I suppose I'll... forgive<n>you! ♪ After all, you're
in love with<n>me, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's with that reaction?<n>Then... do you hate me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Haha, you mean you love me,right? ♪ And you know what? I think Imight just...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...not finish that sentence justyet! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
How about this—if you go on a date<n>with me... then maybe
I'll tell you what<n>I was about to say!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And you might learn more about me,<n>too! So? What'll it be,
Big Bro?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And you might learn more about me,<n>too! So? What'll it be,
Big Sis?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Haha, yay! ♪ It's a date, then! ♪<n>There—got your arm!

I spend the rest of the day with a<n>pleased Curren.
Somehow, I feel like<n>today's events have brought us a<n>
little closer...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Bro, I could go for a caffe latte<n>right about now! So,
pleeease! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Sis, I could go for a caffe latte<n>right about now! So,
pleeease! ♪
...But then again, maybe not.
